lines.text: The rich have nothing to offer each other.
I don't want to write a book about my life. Living it was bad enough!

[after Diana loses her fishing pole in the water]
The fish have to win sometimes. Otherwise they get suspicious.
I feel like a small boy whose mother has dropped him off at school gor the first time.

[to Diana about John]
Whatever he's looking for he won't find it in Rio.

[to Diana]
Are you scared of me... or you?
